text: aur moosa ne praarthana keeh he mere paaralanahaar! toone firaun aur usake pramukhon ko saansaarik jeevan mein shobha tatha dhan-dhaany pradaan kiya hai. to mere paalanahaar! kya isalie ki ve teree raah se vichalit karate rahen? he mere paalanahaar! unake dhanon ko nirast kar de aur unake dil kade kar de ki ve eemaan na laayen, jab tak duhkhadaayee yaatana na dekh len
